name: Trove: Geode Companion Pack 2
summary: What could be better than scoring a rad(ish) new companion? Get an uncommon Wistful Froleek companion, a heaping helping of Bronze Companion Eggs & more. Includes Wistful Froleek companion, 25x Crystal Pinatas, 10x Accelerite, 5x Bronze Companion Eggs, 2x Lodestars
